LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCap.label: Garrison Cap
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCap.description: A soft cap for service man when combat helmet is not required.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCoat.label: Garrison Coat
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCoat.description: A typical standard-issue coat for the army, it keeps one warm in chilly weather.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_HazardSuit.label: Hazard Suit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_HazardSuit.description: A multiple-layered suit that conceals the wearer's entire head and body. It is worn as the go-to apparel against hazardous materials such as disease or parasitic infection entities.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PowerSkelton.label: Powered Exoskeleton Unit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PowerSkelton.description: A physical enhancement equipment created from an array of neurally-controlled prosthetic skeletons. It can effectively increase the wearer's load-bearing capacity and ensure minimum walking and operating capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_UnitSuit.label: Jumpsuit Colonial Uniform
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_UnitSuit.description: A standard issue jumpsuit uniform for any colonization fleet crew member and standard combat trooper.
